channel.title: 彭博-市场

item.title: 今天，俄罗斯的入侵已进入第三个年头，乌克兰对防空警报的干扰已习以为常，令人痛心。
item.description:
As Russia’s invasion enters its third year today, Ukraine has become sadly accustomed to disruptions from air-raid sirens. https://t.co/tJaK0xIwUF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 25, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 通过从达能手中夺得中国顶级饮料品牌控制权而成为中国首富的白手起家的亿万富翁宗庆后去世，享年 79 岁。
item.description:

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 25, 2024

item.title: 印度的家庭支出在过去 12 年中增长了一倍多，消费者在服装、电视和娱乐等方面的支出增加了
item.description:
India's household spending has more than doubled in the past 12 years, with consumers splurging more on things like clothes, TVs and entertainment https://t.co/067nKgEISR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 25, 2024

item.title: 香港财政司司长陈茂波在 2 月 28 日公布新财政预算案前写道，香港计划在面临赤字时更集中、更有效地使用有限的公共资源。
item.description:

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 25, 2024

item.title: 墨西哥政府以 8760 万美元的价格从三菱公司手中收购了 ESSA 盐业生产商 49% 的股份，并将其收归国有。
item.description:

item.title: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱伊在美国保守派会议期间会见了唐纳德-特朗普，并向更多关注竞选言论的人群发表了经济学教授演讲

item.title: Capital One 将以 350 亿美元的价格收购 Discover，这将使两家最大的信用卡公司合二为一，并与华尔街其他巨头展开竞争。
item.description:
Capital One is set to buy Discover in a $35 billion deal that would bring together two of the biggest credit card firms and allow them to compete with other Wall Street behemoths.@RitikaGuptaTV explains what that could mean for consumers https://t.co/YYuCIsduCl pic.twitter.com/511UU21Z6T

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 24, 2024

item.title: 西非国家经济共同体（ECOWAS）领导人周六解除了去年尼日尔发生政变后对尼日尔实施的影响深远的制裁措施
item.description:

item.title: 去年申请破产保护的巴西公用事业公司 Light SA 发布了新版司法恢复计划，计划增资 15 亿雷亚尔，与债权人进行债务重组谈判。
item.description:
Light SA, a Brazilian utility that filed for bankruptcy protection last year, released a new version of its judicial recovery plan outlining capital increase of 1.5 billion reais amid ongoing negotiations with creditors to restructure its debt https://t.co/W2dPclfQYO
